com.cs421.rccar.Master
Class Master

java.lang.Object
  com.cs421.rccar.Master.Master

public class Master
extends java.lang.Object

This class serves as a communication interface between the MasterButtonActivity/MasterAccelerometerActivity and the Driveable object. This class receives input from its containing activity and passes that command to a driveable object

Author:
David Widen, Jessie Young, Thomas Cheng
